RESEARCH | AWARD GUIDE | FIVESTARPROFESSIONAL.COM
Hello, {!Contact.ACDF_FName__c}!
I’ve got some exciting news to share with you about your Five Star award! For a limited time, I’m able to offer my first-year winners a special Welcome Package I’ve put together to optimize your social media buzz around the award. The service normally sells for $129, but I want to welcome you as a Five Star winner by giving it to you free of charge.
Below are a few details about the service:
Our announcement service is a convenient email and social media tool with a handy feedback loop for getting the word out on your business and achievements. It’s also a tool to help generate testimonials and referrals. Benefit from a third-party announcement of your award through email and social media Employ a simple and direct means for clients to provide feedback, testimonials and referrals Receive a presentation-ready report of testimonials, comments and referrals See the effectiveness of your campaign with detailed response metrics including open rates and social interactions
To claim this Welcome Package, give me a call or click here to schedule an appointment. I'll set you up!
